api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

automation.description: The automation ID's (can be multiple as comma-separated) to add the contact to

contact_email.description: The email address of the contact you want to have added to the automation (either this or contact_id is required)

contact_id.description: The ID of the contact you want to have added to the automation (either this or contact_email is required)
